author: andschwa
body: Jenkins needs to be told the new locations of the repositories.

comments.author: andschwa
comments.body:
All right, Jenkins has been updated for PowerShell-Linux at least.

The [GitHub Pull Request Builder Plugin](https://github.com/jenkinsci/ghprb-plugin/blob/master/README.md) was investigated (as I'd really like to use it) but will not work with Jenkins behind the corporate firewall.

title: Update Jenkins
